title: ICE: src/librustc_lint/types.rs:858: unexpected type in foreign function: T

labels.name: A-lint
labels.description: Area: Lints (warnings about flaws in source code) such as unused_mut.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
```rust
fn _f<T>() {
    extern "C" {
        static _a: *const T;
    }
}
```
